title: RuSentiment - Social Media Sentiment
description: 5-class sentiment annotation for social media posts based on RuSentiment (Rogers et al., COLING 2018). Includes Positive, Negative, Neutral, Speech Act (greetings/thanks), and Skip categories. Achieved 0.654 Fleiss kappa with 250-350 posts/hour annotation speed.
citation:
@inproceedings{rogers-etal-2018-rusentiment,
    title = "{R}u{S}entiment: An Enriched Sentiment Analysis Dataset for Social Media in {R}ussian",
    author = "Rogers, Anna  and Romanov, Alexey  and Rumshisky, Anna  and Volkova, Svitlana  and Gronas, Mikhail  and Gribov, Alex",
    booktitle = "Proceedings of the 27th International Conference on Computational Linguistics",
    month = aug,
    year = "2018",
    address = "Santa Fe, New Mexico, USA",
    publisher = "Association for Computational Linguistics",
    url = "https://aclanthology.org/C18-1064",
    pages = "755--763"
}
